rows.label: tlk401003_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm Superbian, yet I live
under Acedia's protection.

rows.label: tlk401003_msg0003
rows.name:
I live alongside people
from Invidia and Gula.

rows.label: tlk401003_msg0005
rows.name:
They're glaring at each other
with those dangerous things...

rows.label: tlk401003_msg0006
rows.name:
And to get along, they have
to hold some grand banquet.

rows.label: tlk401003_msg0008
rows.name:
If they have time for that, they
should be saving their own people...

rows.label: tlk401003_msg0009
rows.name:
It's infuriating... I'd like to
show the higher-ups this camp.
